describe: Turkey is a transcontinental country located mainly on the Anatolian Peninsula in Western Asia, with a smaller portion on the Balkan Peninsula in Southeast Europe. It is known for its rich cultural heritage, diverse landscapes, and historical significance as a bridge between East and West.

cities.name: 🌋 Istanbul
cities.geographical_location: Located in the northwest of Turkey, straddling Europe and Asia across the Bosphorus Strait.
cities.climate: Istanbul has a temperate climate with hot, humid summers and cold, wet winters.

cities.name: 🏝 Antalya
cities.geographical_location: Situated on the southwestern coast of Turkey, along the Mediterranean Sea.
cities.climate: Antalya has a hot-summer Mediterranean climate with hot, dry summers and mild, rainy winters.

cities.name: 🏙 Cappadocia
cities.geographical_location: Located in central Turkey, known for its unique rock formations and historical heritage.
cities.climate: Cappadocia has a semi-arid continental climate with hot, dry summers and cold, snowy winters.
